For consultants under supervision
I am a representative working under supervision of Dialdirect. I comply with the Fit and proper requirements of honesty and intergrity and I am working towards completing the competency requirements. I do want to assure you that I am fully capable of assisting you. We calculate our premiums using the ratings of various factors and I will need to ask you a number of questions to determine your risk profile. Please know that any incorrect information may affect you at claims stage.

For consultants under supervision
I am an authorised representative of Daildirect. I comply with the Fit and proper requirements relating to honesty and integrity as well as competency. We calculate our premiums using the ratings of various factors and I will need to ask you a number of questions to determine your risk profile. Please know that any incorrect information may affect you at claims stage.
Do you consent to your personal information being processed within our group for existing and new product related information?

<form [formGroup]="prossessingPermission">
	<mat-radio-group aria-label="Select an option" style="color:white" #response formControlName="response">
		<mat-radio-button value="yes" radioButton="response">Yes</mat-radio-button>
		<mat-radio-button class="sidePadding10px" value="no" radioButton="response">No</mat-radio-button>
	</mat-radio-group>
</form>

Should you accept our policy, please be sure you compare our policy schedule to your existing policy schedule to ensure we are comparing like for like and that we are able to provide you with similar or better cover and benefits.
